releaseNotes:
Welcome to Microsoft Edge! Check out what's new in this release: 
• Introducing the New Copilot: This update includes an intuitive design with more digestible and faster answers. 
• PDF Summarization by Copilot: Get AI-Powered Summaries and Highlights Directly in Your Browser!
• New Search Box: Boost your navigation efficiency! Note: Profile is now in the Menu. 
• Bug fixes, stability, and performance improvements. 
Upgrade to the latest version and enjoy a smarter, more efficient Microsoft Edge!
description:
Microsoft Edge, your AI-powered browser, designed to enhance your browsing experience.  With the help of AI-powered features on Edge, it lets you stay updated on the latest news, find recipes while grocery shopping, research new workout routines, or explore local events. Microsoft Edge is a smarter way to browse, find, do, shop and stay safe on the go.

When shopping for the latest tech gadgets, fashion essentials, or everyday groceries, Edge provides smart tools to help you save, making confident shopping easier and saving money effortlessly.  
 
All while your passwords and Wallet travel securely with you, providing peace of mind while shopping or managing payments on the go. 

Browse the web securely and prioritize your privacy with smart security tools, such as tracking prevention, Microsoft Defender Smartscreen, AdBlock, InPrivate browsing and InPrivate search. Safeguard your browsing history for a more secure and private online experience. 

Experience efficiency at your fingertips with Microsoft Edge on your mobile device, designed to sync with your desktop for a more connected browsing experience. Easily transfer files between devices using drop, and quickly upload documents and photos from your phone to your desktop with mobile upload.   

Download and enjoy a more connected and intuitive browsing experience with Microsoft Edge, wherever you are.

MICROSOFT EDGE FEATURES:

A SMARTER WAY TO FIND
• Enhance your searches with smart features built in to help you find exactly what you’re looking for, providing comprehensive answers, helps you easily summarize documents and web content.

A SMARTER WAY TO SHOP
• Shop using built-in tools that helps you save time, save money and shop confidently. 
• Edge scans the web for available coupons allowing you to easily apply them to your cart for you to maximize your savings
• Earn cashback easily on purchases from leading retailers and grocery stores with Microsoft Rewards* – a free program that gives Microsoft Rewards members cashback or rebates when shopping with participating retailers.
• With seamless syncing to your desktop, you get access to Microsoft security features, like Wallet, wherever you are. Wallet securely stores payment methods and passwords and provides access to virtual cards for added protection while shopping on the go.

A SMARTER WAY TO DO
• Tailor your browsing experience with powerful extensions and redefine the way you browse.
• Listen to content while performing other tasks or improve your reading comprehension with Read Aloud, in your desired language. Available in a variety of natural-sounding voices and accents.

A SMARTER WAY TO STAY SAFE
• Browse securely with InPrivate browsing that safeguards sensitive information from trackers.
• Enhanced privacy protection in InPrivate mode, with no search history saved to Microsoft Bing or associated with your Microsoft account.
• Password monitoring helps you be alerted when credentials that you have saved to the browser are detected on the dark web.
• Default tracking prevention for a more private browsing experience.
• Secure synchronization of favorites, passwords, and other data.
• Ad Blocker – use AdBlock Plus to block unwanted ads, enhance focus and remove distracting content.
• Stay protected while you browse by blocking phishing and malware attacks with Microsoft Defender Smartscreen.

Get Microsoft Edge, your AI-powered browser, and explore a smarter way to browse, find, do and shop beyond what you ever thought possible.

A fast and secure web browser prioritizing security, safety and privacy.

*This shopping feature is currently only available in the United States. Microsoft account required.
